def optimal_distribution(total, drink_volumes):
    drink_total_vol = [total / (2 + len(drink_volumes) - 1)] * len(drink_volumes)
    drink_total_vol[0] /= 2
    drink_counts = [int(-(-v // drink_volumes[i])) for (i, v) in enumerate(drink_total_vol)]
    return drink_counts
